title: (x) ID of font needed - Decadentia {Dav}
content:
It’d be much appreciated if someone could ID this font for me.

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v632/TheBlackTemplar/type2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127130346/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v632/TheBlackTemplar/type2.jpg)

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v632/TheBlackTemplar/type1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127130346/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v632/TheBlackTemplar/type1.jpg)

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v632/TheBlackTemplar/welcome.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127130346/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v632/TheBlackTemplar/welcome.jpg)

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v632/TheBlackTemplar/site\_19.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127130346/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v632/TheBlackTemplar/site_19.jpg)
author: TheTemplar

comments.content:
Tim, I still think its ‘Decadentia’, take a look at the lowercase..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127130346/http:/www.formlos.net/)

Dav, you are quite correct.  
btw it is also available as Rothenburg at [Typoasis](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127130346/http:/moorstation.org/fontennium/blackheav/fsheav2.htm)  
Tim
